description.value: A ghast's blood is black and tar-like. It has value among the arcane community, especially with necromancers. Alchemists may also find it useful in their concoctions Use: A creature may spend 1 minute covering itself in ghast blood. Undead creatures with an Intelligence of less than 10 have disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks to find the covered creature. This effect lasts for 1 hour or until the blood is washed off.
